programme.title: Ouija: Origin Of Evil
programme.desc: Premiere. In 1967 Los Angeles, a widowed mother and her two daughters add a new stunt to boost their seance scam business. However, they get more than they bargained for when they invite an evil presence into their home. Supernatural horror prequel, starring Elizabeth Reaser and Annalise Basso

programme.title: Daylight's End
programme.desc: A drifter reluctantly agrees to help a small group unaffected by the plague which has turned most humans into bloodthirsty monsters. Horror, starring Johnny Strong, Lance Henriksen and Louis Mandylor

programme.title: Blinky Bill
programme.desc: Premiere. A koala embarks on an epic adventure to find his missing father, teaming up with some pals and venturing into the dangerous Outback. Animated adventure, with the voices of Billy Birmingham, Toni Collette and Charlotte Rose Hamlyn

programme.title: The Dragon Spell
programme.desc: Premiere. A young boy embarks on a quest to save the world of humans and the world of magic, with the aid of an aspiring wizard and feral wild child. Animated fantasy, featuring the voices of Viktor Andrienko, Kate Bristol and Allen Enlow

programme.title: Man Down
programme.desc: Premiere. Former US Marine Gabriel Drummer returns home from Afghanistan and searches for the whereabouts of his son, accompanied by his best friend. Drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Jai Courtney and Kate Mara

programme.desc: After failing to open the door to a woman who later turns up dead, a guilt-stricken young medical doctor turns amateur detective. Belgian-French thriller, starring Adele Haenel, Olivier Bonnaud, Jeremie Renier and Louka Minnella

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: A pair of outlaw brothers hunting for the men that killed their father take refuge in a desolate town, but soon discover that they're not alone. Post-apocalyptic horror, starring Aria Emory, Drew Harwood, Monique Rosario(n)

programme.title: Eliminators
programme.desc: A former federal agent in the witness protection programme is forced to come out of hiding and go on the run. Thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Stu Bennett and Daniel Caltagirone(n)

programme.title: Crimson Peak
programme.desc: An aspiring writer marries a British aristocrat, and goes to live with him and his sister in their sinister ancestral home. She is tormented by ghostly apparitions and seeks to uncover the terrifying secrets in the family's past. Guillermo del Toro's gothic horror, starring Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston and Jessica Chastain

programme.title: Let's Be Evil
programme.desc: Badly in need of money, a young woman takes a job supervising an advanced learning programme that quickly spirals out of control. Thriller, starring Kara Tointon, Jamie Bernadette and Isabelle Allen

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Paranormal Activity: The Ghost Dimension
programme.desc: A man moves into a new house along with his wife, daughter and younger brother, and finds an old camcorder and a box of videotapes. The siblings start watching the tapes, which turn out to be home movies shot by the property's previous owners, but by doing so, they unleash evil spirits into the world. Horror sequel, starring Chris J Murray and Brit Shaw

programme.title: The Childhood of a Leader
programme.desc: Ignored by his distant, disciplinarian parents, youngster Prescott develops into an ego-driven brat whose behaviour becomes increasingly unsettling. Psychological drama, starring Berenice Bejo, Liam Cunningham, Stacy Martin and Tom Sweet

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: The latest in a long line of genetically engineered clones bred to be the perfect assassin takes on a mission that strikes close to home. A corporation intends to use the technology that created him to build an army of superhuman killers. As the assassin fights to bring them down, he uncovers the dark secrets surrounding his origin. Action thriller, starring Rupert Friend, Hannah Ware and Zachary Quinto

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick

programme.title: Spectre
programme.desc: James Bond goes rogue after receiving a cryptic message that sets him on the trail of a secretive criminal network. While his colleagues face a new threat closer to home, Bond embarks on a globetrotting journey in search of the elusive mastermind behind the syndicate - whom he discovers may have links to his own past. Spy thriller, starring Daniel Craig, Christoph Waltz, Lea Seydoux and Ralph Fiennes

programme.title: Snoopy and Charlie Brown: The Peanuts Movie
programme.desc: The long-suffering youngster hopes his lifelong run of bad luck will come to an end when he develops a crush on a new schoolfriend. His beloved dog has more important things to worry about, as he dreams of taking to the skies in his airborne kennel. Animated comedy, with the voices of Noah Schnapp and Bill Melendez

programme.title: The Legend Of Tarzan
programme.desc: Years after leaving his old home behind, Tarzan is lured back to Africa and into a trap. Adventure, starring Alexander Skarsgard, Margot Robbie and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: A child psychologist, disheartened after the suicide of a former patient, takes on the case of a terrified boy haunted by ghostly apparitions, and tries to help him discover what the spirits want from him. M Night Shyamalan's supernatural thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Haley Joel Osment, Toni Collette and Olivia Williams

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: A group of children who escaped from an isolated community at the centre of a mysterious labyrinth find themselves in a desolate wasteland. As they seek the truth about the organisation that imprisoned them, they face a series of terrible dangers. Sci-fi adventure based on the second of James Dashner's series of novels, starring Dylan O'Brien and Kaya Scodelario

programme.title: Friend Request
programme.desc: A teenager meets a girl online, only to find she is a demonic entity intent on killing her real friends. Horror, starring Alycia Debnam-Carey and William Moseley

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his son's tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence Special
programme.desc: A preview of the sci-fi sequel, which stars Jeff Goldblum, Liam Hemsworth, Bill Pullman and Charlotte Gainsbourg

programme.title: Regression
programme.desc: In 1990, Minnesota detective Bruce Kenner finds evidence of a satanic cult when he investigates the case of John Gray, who admits to sexually abusing his 17-year-old daughter Angela, but has no recollection of it. Psychological thriller, starring Ethan Hawke, Emma Watson and David Thewlis

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: When rivalry leaves them cast adrift on the streets of New York, two bickering hounds must put their differences aside and pull together. Animated adventure from the makers of Despicable Me, featuring the voices of Louis CK, Eric Stonestreet and Kevin Hart

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: A political advisor's career ends in disaster when she ends up at the centre of a major scandal. She is lured out of retirement to help the embattled president of Bolivia to get re-elected, but finds the opposition is being assisted by an old rival, who uses every dirty trick in the book to wreck her campaign. Comedy drama, starring Sandra Bullock, Billy Bob Thornton and Anthony Mackie

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: The manager of a struggling baseball team faces disaster, as his star players are bought out by richer clubs and he is unable to afford to replace them. An economics student offers him a solution to his problems, finding a ground-breaking way to analyse the performance of cheaper players and combining their abilities to form a winning side. Fact-based drama, starring Brad Pitt, Jonah Hill and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets
programme.desc: When rivalry leaves them cast adrift on the streets of New York, two bickering hounds must put their differences aside and pull together. Animated adventure from the makers of Despicable Me, featuring the voices of Louis CK, Eric Stonestreet and Kevin Hart

programme.title: Starsky & Hutch
programme.desc: Two mismatched detectives are forced to work together for the first time to track down a crime kingpin who has introduced a new, undetectable narcotic to the streets - but they struggle to get along. Comedy spoofing the 1970s cop show, starring Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson, Snoop Dogg, Vince Vaughn and Juliette Lewis

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: A boy is raised by animals in the jungles of India, but his carefree life is threatened by the return of a fierce tiger with a grudge against humans. The youngster faces a difficult choice between remaining with his friends or returning to his own people. Live action remake of Disney's animated adventure based on Rudyard Kipling's stories, starring Neel Sethi, with the voices of Bill Murray, Ben Kingsley and Idris Elba

programme.title: Sausage Party
programme.desc: When he hears life after the supermarket isn't much fun for groceries, Frank the sausage investigates. Animated comedy, featuring the voices of Seth Rogen and Kristen Wiig

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: A renegade general and his crack team of mercenaries take over the abandoned fortress prison of Alcatraz and threaten San Francisco with toxic nerve-gas rockets to extort a massive ransom. To break their stranglehold on the city, the FBI sends in a chemical weapons expert and a jailed SAS veteran, chosen because he is the only man to have ever escaped from the infamous penitentiary. Action thriller, with Sean Connery, Nicolas Cage and Ed Harris

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The bandana-wearing one-man army has turned his back on violence to live a quiet life in Thailand. But before long he takes up arms once again to rescue a party of missionaries who have been taken captive en route to Burma by a sadistic military officer. Action sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Julie Benz and Graham McTavish(n)

programme.title: Rupture
programme.desc: A divorced single mother is kidnapped and kept for experimentation by a group of sinister scientists. Sci-fi horror-thriller, starring Noomi Rapace, Peter Stormare and Kerry Bishe(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell(n)

programme.title: Last Cab to Darwin
programme.desc: A terminally ill New South Wales taxi driver sets out on a cross-country road trip in a bid to die on his own terms. Australian drama, starring Michael Caton, Ningali Lawford and Mark Coles Smith(n)

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: The story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, and his friendship with his mentor at Trinity College, Cambridge, Professor GH Hardy. Biographical drama, starring Jeremy Irons, Dev Patel and Malcolm Sinclair(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Dracula is worried that his half-human grandson is not showing any vampiric tendencies, so enlists the help of his fellow monsters in showing the youngster how it is done. The count is shocked to receive an unwelcome visit from his own father, who does not approve of his son's tolerance of humans. Animated comedy, with the voices of Adam Sandler and Andy Samberg(n)

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A ragtag team of gifted villains, including Deadshot, Harley Quinn and Killer Croc, are strong-armed into doing good by a no-nonsense government agent. Fantasy adventure, starring Will Smith, Margot Robbie and Jared Leto(n)

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: A couple seek the aid of a former rival in fighting back against the raucous college sorority that moves in next door to them. Comedy, starring Seth Rogen and Zac Efron(n)

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Outsider Red does not fit in among his island community, but he is the only one to smell a rat when a fleet of green pigs pitch up. Animation, with the voice of Jason Sudeikis(n)

programme.title: Sisters
programme.desc: Two estranged sisters are reunited when their parents decide to sell the house they grew up in. They return to the family home to clear out their childhood bedrooms, but with their parents away, seize the chance to relive their teenage years and throw one last wild house party. Comedy, starring Amy Poehler, Tina Fey and Dianne Wiest(n)

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A ragtag team of gifted villains, including Deadshot, Harley Quinn and Killer Croc, are strong-armed into doing good by a no-nonsense government agent. Fantasy adventure, starring Will Smith, Margot Robbie and Jared Leto(n)

programme.title: Bad Neighbours 2
programme.desc: A couple seek the aid of a former rival in fighting back against the raucous college sorority that moves in next door to them. Comedy, starring Seth Rogen and Zac Efron(n)

programme.title: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan
programme.desc: A Kazakhstani journalist is sent to the United States to learn about the country and its customs. However, when the inquisitive reporter stumbles across an episode of Baywatch featuring Pamela Anderson, he becomes convinced she is his future bride and embarks on a reckless mission to track her down. Spoof documentary, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Ken Davitian and Pamela Anderson

programme.title: The Sweetest Thing
programme.desc: A woman more interested in one-night stands than true love is forced to reassess her priorities after meeting the man of her dreams. However, when she hears he is getting married, she sets out on a hectic road trip across America to stop the wedding. Romantic comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Christina Applegate, Selma Blair and Thomas Jane

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy reboot, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast

programme.title: Police Academy 6: City Under Siege
programme.desc: The clueless cops return yet again, this time to thwart the machinations of a crime lord behind a wave of raids and robberies in the city. Unfortunately, they are unaware Mr Big is always one step ahead thanks to a police informer. Penultimate entry in the comedy series, starring Bubba Smith, David Graf, Michael Winslow, Matt McCoy and Leslie Easterbrook

programme.title: What About Bob
programme.desc: A psychiatrist takes on a friend's client, who turns out to be a well-meaning but annoying neurotic barely able to leave his home. The patient is hugely impressed by the consultant's methods, leading him to follow the therapist on holiday, where he unwittingly proceeds to make his life hell while winning over his family. Comedy, starring Bill Murray, Richard Dreyfuss, Julie Hagerty and Charlie Korsmo

programme.title: Sadie's Last Days on Earth
programme.desc: High school student Sadie has two weeks to ready herself before doomsday. In that time she needs to master survivalist cuisine, go to a high school party, kiss a boy and get her best friend back. Comedy, starring Morgan Taylor Campbell, Paula Brancati and Michael Brown

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy reboot, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
programme.desc: A stressed businessman just wants to make it home to spend Thanksgiving with his family. However, when his flight is forced to land miles from its destination, he finds himself sharing a disaster-strewn journey across America with an amiable but slobbish salesman. Comedy road movie, starring Steve Martin, John Candy, Laila Robins, Kevin Bacon and Michael McKean

programme.title: In & Out
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning actor announces on national TV that his former schoolteacher is gay, causing uproar in the close-knit community where he grew up, and forcing the beleaguered tutor to convince his family, fiancee and pupils that he is straight. Comedy, starring Kevin Kline, Matt Dillon, Tom Selleck and Joan Cusack

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: When it becomes obvious that his solo album is a flop, a former boy band member does everything he can to maintain his celebrity status. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg, Jorma Taccone and Akiva Schaffer

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: A woman recovering from a break-up receives an unexpected visit from her granddaughter, who desperately needs to raise $600 before the end of the day. They visit a series of old contacts in search of a loan, which leads to long-buried secrets coming to light. Comedy drama, starring Lily Tomlin and Julia Garner

programme.title: Working Girl
programme.desc: Naive but ambitious secretary Tess discovers her conniving boss has been claiming credit for her ideas. She hatches a plan to get revenge and further her own career into the bargain, with a little help from the unscrupulous executive's boyfriend. Comedy, starring Melanie Griffith, Sigourney Weaver, Harrison Ford, Joan Cusack and Alec Baldwin

programme.title: Dad's Army
programme.desc: The officious captain of a seaside town's home guard platoon tries to maintain the reputation and morale of his troops as the Second World War draws to a close. He finds himself dealing with the hunt for a German spy as well as a female journalist sent to report on the exploits of the brave but bumbling soldiers. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Toby Jones, Bill Nighy and Catherine Zeta-Jones

programme.title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
programme.desc: When it becomes obvious that his solo album is a flop, a former boy band member does everything he can to maintain his celebrity status. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg, Jorma Taccone and Akiva Schaffer

programme.title: Grimsby
programme.desc: Two brothers are separated at birth, the younger growing up to be MI6's top agent while the older becomes a layabout football hooligan. When they are finally reunited, the dim-witted elder sibling ends up helping his brother foil an evil plan that threatens the entire world. Action comedy, starring Sacha Baron Cohen, Mark Strong and Rebel Wilson

programme.title: The Cable Guy
programme.desc: A man makes the mistake of engaging a cable TV installer in conversation in a ploy to get all the channels for free. However, the manic repairman shows an invincible determination to be his new best friend - and does not take kindly to rejection. Comedy directed by Ben Stiller, starring Jim Carrey, Matthew Broderick and George Segal

programme.title: Bruce Almighty
programme.desc: God tires of a down-on-his-luck reporter's constant complaining, so passes on His powers to give him a taste of ultimate responsibility. The newsman falls in love with his extraordinary abilities - but a never-ending stream of incoming prayers and his ambitious attempt to please everyone soon prove there is more to the job than meets the eye. Comedy, starring Jim Carrey, Jennifer Aniston and Morgan Freeman

programme.title: Revenge of the Nerds
programme.desc: Two social outcasts set up their own college fraternity for similarly un-hip students to give the campus sporting jocks a run for their money. Comedy, starring Anthony Edwards, Robert Carradine, Ted McGinley and Timothy Busfield

programme.title: Police Academy 7: Mission to Moscow
programme.desc: Commandant Lassard sends the incompetent cops to Russia to help their counterparts capture an elusive criminal mastermind who uses his genius with computers to pull off a series of daring robberies. Comedy sequel, starring George Gaynes, Michael Winslow, David Graf, Leslie Easterbrook and Christopher Lee

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Special
programme.desc: The making of the long-awaited horror comedy reboot, including interviews with Melissa McCarthy and the rest of the cast

programme.title: Wild Oats
programme.desc: When a woman wrongly receives millions of dollars in life insurance, her best friend convinces her to take off and spend it. Comedy, starring Shirley MacLaine, Jessica Lange and Billy Connolly

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: A Californian detective investigating the murder of a local man by drug smugglers has only one witness to help him solve the case - the large, smelly dog that belonged to the victim, which is about to turn the detective's well-ordered existence into chaos. Family comedy, starring Tom Hanks, Mare Winningham and Craig T Nelson

programme.title: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: Two feuding New York lawyers head for Ireland to represent a rock star and his wife in their divorce proceedings. But after a drink-fuelled knees-up, the baffled attorneys wake to find they have accidentally married each other. Romantic comedy, starring Pierce Brosnan, Julianne Moore, Parker Posey, Michael Sheen and Frances Fisher

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Years after being humiliated as a student, rogue CIA agent Robbie Wheirdicht turns to old classmate Calvin Joyner for help when he's targeted by his own organisation. Action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart and Amy Ryan

programme.title: Keeping Up with the Joneses
programme.desc: A normal suburban couple discover their seemingly perfect neighbours are undercover spies. Action comedy, starring Zach Galifianakis, Jon Hamm and Wonder Woman's Gal Gadot

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: The struggling owner of a run-down gym is forced to take drastic action to prevent an arrogant fitness guru buying the business out from under him - and enlists his customers to form a dodgeball team in the hope of triumphing in the US championships. Sporting comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn and Christine Taylor

programme.title: The First Wives Club
programme.desc: Three former college friends reunite at the funeral of a mutual acquaintance, who killed herself after her husband left her for a younger woman. Finding themselves in a similar situation, the trio decide to take action and hit their former partners where it hurts most - their finances. Comedy, starring Goldie Hawn, Bette Midler, Diane Keaton, Maggie Smith, Dan Hedaya, Bronson Pinchot and Elizabeth Berkley

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Years after being humiliated as a student, rogue CIA agent Robbie Wheirdicht turns to old classmate Calvin Joyner for help when he's targeted by his own organisation. Action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart and Amy Ryan

programme.title: Keeping Up with the Joneses
programme.desc: A normal suburban couple discover their seemingly perfect neighbours are undercover spies. Action comedy, starring Zach Galifianakis, Jon Hamm and Wonder Woman's Gal Gadot

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane
programme.desc: A highly paid executive loses everything after his corrupt boss's false accounting ruins the firm and leaves him to take the blame. Flat-broke and with no income or savings to maintain his lavish lifestyle, he and his wife decide the only way to support themselves is to turn to crime. Remake of the 1976 comedy, with Jim Carrey, Tea Leoni, Alec Baldwin and Richard Jenkins

programme.title: How to Lose Friends & Alienate People
programme.desc: A self-promoting writer is offered a position on the staff of a New York fashion magazine thanks to his irreverent views on the world of celebrity. However, he soon discovers his opinions render him incapable of relating to the superficial personalities he is expected to work with, not to mention his egotistical boss. Comedy based on Toby Young's memoirs, starring Simon Pegg, Kirsten Dunst, Jeff Bridges, Megan Fox and Gillian Anderson(n)

programme.title: Airheads
programme.desc: Frustrated heavy metal band the Lone Rangers are determined to get air time for their new record and take a radio station hostage to ensure it happens. Comedy, starring Steve Buscemi, Brendan Fraser, Adam Sandler and Michael McKean(n)

programme.title: Trapped in Paradise
programme.desc: Three bungling brothers manage to pull off a major robbery in a backwoods community on Christmas Eve, but the unwitting locals make them feel so welcome they find it impossible to leave town, leaving the crooks facing a crisis of conscience. Comedy, starring Nicolas Cage, Dana Carvey, Jon Lovitz and Madchen Amick(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen(n)

programme.title: Hot Shots
programme.desc: A pilot joins an elite squad to take part in a dangerous mission, but faces a struggle to live down his father's bad reputation - and win the love of a glamorous psychiatrist. Comedy spoofing action movies - principally Top Gun - starring Charlie Sheen, Lloyd Bridges, Valeria Golino, Cary Elwes, Kevin Dunn and William O'Leary(n)

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: An American police college lowers its entrance requirements in the hope of attracting new recruits, and in response, assorted dubious candidates turn up for enrolment. A short-tempered instructor is determined to weed out the bad apples, but a riot provides the clueless cops with a chance to prove their worth. Comedy, starring Steve Guttenberg, Kim Cattrall, Bubba Smith and GW Bailey(n)

programme.title: Scouts Guide To The Zombie Apocalypse
programme.desc: Three boy scouts look forward to spending their last camping trip together. However, they soon have a more pressing need for their wilderness survival skills when their home town is overrun with the walking dead. Fortunately, a tough cocktail waitress is on hand to help the youngsters survive the zombie onslaught. Comedy horror, starring Tye Sheridan, Logan Miller and Joey Morgan(n)

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: A mild-mannered man hopes for his wife's two children to view him as their father. His dreams of perfect family life are threatened by the return of their biological father, a charismatic, motorcycle-riding tough guy, and he pulls out all the stops to prove to his stepchildren that he can be just as cool. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg(n)

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: A struggling Hollywood producer comes up with a cunning plan to splice secretly filmed footage of a famous action star into his latest low-budget sci-fi movie to give it a veneer of quality. However, his efforts drive the bewildered actor into having paranoid delusions that aliens really have invaded the Earth. Comedy, starring Steve Martin, Eddie Murphy, Heather Graham, Robert Downey Jr and Terence Stamp(n)

programme.title: Patch Adams
programme.desc: A talented student doctor turns the medical community upside down with his offbeat views about the healing power of laughter. His methods provoke outrage and intense debate among his professors - but his extrovert nature brightens the lives of all kinds of patients. Comedy drama, starring Robin Williams, Monica Potter, Daniel London, Bob Gunton and Philip Seymour Hoffman(n)

programme.title: Hail, Caesar
programme.desc: An executive in 1950s Hollywood is employed to bury scandals, solve problems and ensure everything goes to plan for the studio. In one fraught day, he has to contend with the kidnapping of the leading man from the set of an ancient Roman epic, a musical star's secret pregnancy, and a director who has objects to having a miscast actor forced on him. The Coen brothers' comedy, starring Josh Brolin, George Clooney, Scarlett Johansson and Ralph Fiennes(n)

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: A mild-mannered man hopes for his wife's two children to view him as their father. His dreams of perfect family life are threatened by the return of their biological father, a charismatic, motorcycle-riding tough guy, and he pulls out all the stops to prove to his stepchildren that he can be just as cool. Comedy, starring Will Ferrell and Mark Wahlberg(n)

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: A struggling Hollywood producer comes up with a cunning plan to splice secretly filmed footage of a famous action star into his latest low-budget sci-fi movie to give it a veneer of quality. However, his efforts drive the bewildered actor into having paranoid delusions that aliens really have invaded the Earth. Comedy, starring Steve Martin, Eddie Murphy, Heather Graham, Robert Downey Jr and Terence Stamp(n)

programme.title: Coming to America
programme.desc: A bored African prince defies his father's plans for an arranged marriage and escapes to the USA to find a bride on his own terms. Comedy, starring Eddie Murphy and Arsenio Hall in several roles, with James Earl Jones, Allison Dean, Eriq La Salle and Madge Sinclair(n)

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: A child who grows up in slavery becomes a formidable warrior and a cunning thief. Taken prisoner by a victorious king, he is sent out to destroy the leader of the barbaric cult that destroyed his village and slaughtered his family. Fantasy adventure, based on the stories by author Robert E Howard, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Max von Sydow, James Earl Jones and Sandahl Bergman

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: The ruthless vigilante considers hanging up his guns when he learns a gangster he killed was actually an undercover FBI agent. However, he must return to his war on crime when a mobster who was hideously disfigured at his hands assembles a gang of violent criminals to cause mayhem on the streets of New York. Action thriller based on the Marvel comic-book, starring Ray Stevenson and Dominic West

programme.title: Batman & Robin
programme.desc: The caped crusader and his sidekick take on the villainous Mr Freeze, who plans to destroy Gotham City with an icy doomsday weapon unless his demands are met. The dynamic duo also have to contend with femme fatale Poison Ivy, who is determined to drive a wedge between them. Comic-book adventure, starring George Clooney, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Uma Thurman and Chris O'Donnell

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Philadelphia boxer Rocky Balboa quits the ring to marry his sweetheart and become a father. However, times prove hard and money is tight, so when Balboa is offered another shot at Apollo Creed's heavyweight title, the fighter is lured out of retirement. Drama sequel, starring Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Carl Weathers, Burt Young and Burgess Meredith

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit
programme.desc: A truck driver accepts a challenge to deliver a consignment of beer to a party. He claims he can make the 900-mile round trip in just 28 hours, but a pompous sheriff is determined to stop him in his tracks, not least because his prospective daughter-in-law has deserted his son and hitched a ride with the unlikely hero. Comedy, starring Burt Reynolds, Jackie Gleason, Sally Field and Jerry Reed

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit II
programme.desc: The maverick haulier must overcome a crisis of confidence when he and his friends are hired to transport a pregnant elephant to Texas, a mammoth task that proves far from easy, especially with their old enemy in hot pursuit. Road comedy, with Burt Reynolds, Jackie Gleason, Jerry Reed, Dom DeLuise and Sally Field

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit Part 3
programme.desc: Sheriff Buford T Justice (Jackie Gleason), now reluctantly nearing retirement, accepts a wild challenge to race from Miami to Texas in less than 24 hours. Comedy adventure, also starring Jerry Reed, Mike Henry and featuring a cameo appearance by Burt Reynolds

programme.title: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi
programme.desc: A US embassy in Libya comes under attack from extremists, who kill the ambassador. With no help in sight, a small band of CIA security operatives from various military backgrounds takes a stand to fight off the attackers and protect the remaining diplomatic personnel. Fact-based action thriller, starring John Krasinski and James Badge Dale

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Frodo and Sam continue their quest to destroy the all-powerful ring, bringing them face to face with the magical artefact's twisted former owner Gollum. Meanwhile, their allies prepare to make a desperate last stand against the vast armies of the corrupted wizard Saruman, who has declared war on a neighbouring kingdom. Part two of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy, starring Elijah Wood, Sean Astin, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Billy Boyd, Dominic Monaghan, Andy Serkis and Christopher Lee

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers are divided over a system of government control for their actions, leading to war between them. However, before Iron Man's side clashes with Captain America's, Tony Stark recruits extra help in the form of a brilliant young crime fighter called Spider-Man. Superhero adventure, starring Chris Evans, Robert Downey Jr and Scarlett Johansson

Leonidas, fearless king of Sparta, leads 300 of his finest warriors into battle against the vast invading armies of the ruler of the Persian empire. As the outnumbered Spartans fight for their country, his queen, Gorgo, tries to rally support for her husband at home. Fantasy action adventure based on Frank Miller and Lynn Varley's comic-book series, starring Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham and Rodrigo Santoro

programme.title: Braveheart
programme.desc: Account of the life of medieval Scottish hero William Wallace. After the slaughter of his father and brother, young Wallace is taken in by his uncle, who teaches him how to use not only his brawn but his brain - which he employs to great effect years later when he resolves to drive the English out of Scotland. Oscar-winning historical epic, directed by and starring Mel Gibson. With Patrick McGoohan, Sophie Marceau and Catherine McCormack

programme.title: Fast & Furious
programme.desc: News of a friend's murder brings international fugitive Dominic Toretto back to his home city of Los Angeles in search of revenge. It is not long before his pursuit leads him to cross paths with FBI agent Brian O'Conner, and despite their hostile feelings toward each other, the pair work together to bring down those responsible. Thriller sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Michelle Rodriguez and Jordana Brewster

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Philadelphia boxer Rocky Balboa quits the ring to marry his sweetheart and become a father. However, times prove hard and money is tight, so when Balboa is offered another shot at Apollo Creed's heavyweight title, the fighter is lured out of retirement. Drama sequel, starring Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Carl Weathers, Burt Young and Burgess Meredith

programme.title: Swelter
programme.desc: Ten years after their casino heist, four escaped convicts trace their former partner to a desert town, where he is now a lawman with no memory of his criminal past. Drama, starring Jean-Claude Van Damme, Alfred Molina and Lennie James

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: World heavyweight boxing champion Rocky Balboa settles down into a life of luxury - but a cloud appears on the horizon in the shape of ambitious contender Clubber Lang, whose brutal fighting style represents a serious threat to his title. Drama, starring Sylvester Stallone, Mr T, Burgess Meredith, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers and Hulk Hogan

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes on a desolate alien planet inhabited by nocturnal predators. The creatures' fear of light seems to guarantee the survivors' safety - but when an eclipse takes place, they face a desperate struggle to survive. Their only hope lies with a convicted murderer, who is equally at home in the darkness - but is far from trustworthy. Sci-fi horror, starring Vin Diesel and Radha Mitchell

programme.title: The Chronicles of Riddick
programme.desc: Fugitive Riddick evades capture by bounty hunters and steals their spacecraft, only to run into an even bigger threat - fanatical cult members on a sinister mission to kill or convert anyone who crosses their path as they seek galactic domination. Sci-fi adventure sequel, with Vin Diesel reprising his role from Pitch Black alongside Judi Dench, Alexa Davalos and Thandie Newton

programme.title: Twister
programme.desc: A storm-chaser and her estranged husband are brought together in a joint project to monitor the path of an oncoming tornado - but the pair face a race against the clock as a rival government-backed group with hi-tech resources tries to beat them to it. Action thriller, starring Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton, Cary Elwes, Jami Gertz and Philip Seymour Hoffman

programme.title: In the Heart of the Sea
programme.desc: A whaling ship sets sail from New England in 1820, only to come under attack from a gigantic whale that seems to want revenge on them. In the aftermath of the attack, the surviving members of the crew face further physical and moral challenges as they try to stay alive on the open sea. Fact-based historical adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Cillian Murphy and Ben Whishaw

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freya's army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna. However, as war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara unite with Freya in an attempt to end Ravenna's wicked reign once and for all. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Charlize Theron, Emily Blunt and Jessica Chastain

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: The two superheroes become aware of each other's presence on Earth for the first time, and each disapproving of the other's methods. A ruthless billionaire plays on their mutual mistrust to bring about their downfall, leading the heroes to face each other in a battle to the death. Action adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Henry Cavill, Gal Gadot and Jesse Eisenberg

programme.title: Beowulf
programme.desc: The realm of Danish King Hrothgar is terrorised by a fearsome monster. A renowned warrior arrives to slay the beast, but an encounter with its seductive mother gives rise to a terrible bargain with tragic consequences. Animated fantasy based on the English language's oldest surviving epic poem, using motion-capture technology to recreate real actors, including Ray Winstone, Robin Wright, Anthony Hopkins, Angelina Jolie and John Malkovich

programme.title: Face/Off
programme.desc: FBI agent Sean Archer captures terrorist Castor Troy, the man who killed his son. While Troy is in a coma, Archer has the crook's face surgically grafted onto his own so he can go undercover and locate a bomb planted somewhere in Los Angeles. But then Troy regains consciousness - and in turn takes on Archer's identity. John Woo's action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Travolta, Joan Allen, Gina Gershon and Dominique Swain(n)

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: A parolee hitches a ride home on a maximum-security flight conveying some of America's deadliest criminals, and when they hijack the plane in mid-flight he is forced to intervene. Meanwhile, a US marshal has an ongoing battle on the ground to prevent the plane from being blown to pieces. Action thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, John Cusack, John Malkovich, Steve Buscemi, Ving Rhames and Colm Meaney(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Upcoming films(n)

programme.title: Backdraft
programme.desc: The two sons of a fireman who died in the line of duty follow him into the profession. However, a feud develops between them because the elder brother is convinced his sibling is not up to the job - until a mission to uncover the identity of a serial arsonist gives him the chance to prove his worth. Action drama, starring Kurt Russell, William Baldwin, Robert De Niro, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Donald Sutherland(n)

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: The Italian Stallion agrees to help former champion Apollo Creed train for a match against a seemingly invincible boxer from the Soviet Union, only to see his friend die as a result of injuries sustained in the fight. Rocky vows to avenge him, and prepares to take on the Russian heavyweight in his own country. Drama sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Dolph Lundgren, Talia Shire, Carl Weathers and Brigitte Nielsen(n)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: Three private investigators are recruited to rescue a computer genius from the clutches of a rival. They discover there is more at stake than they thought, as the captive genius has created a dangerous piece of software that must not fall into the wrong hands. Action adventure, based on the TV series, starring Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore, Lucy Liu and Bill Murray(n)

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster movie, with John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor(n)

programme.title: The 5th Wave
programme.desc: Earth suffers a series of four devastating attacks from alien invaders, that leaves civilisation in ruins. As the human race awaits the fifth and final onslaught that will wipe them out, a teenage girl tries to protect her younger brother in a dangerous wilderness - and gets drawn into a plan to fight back against the aliens. Sci-fi adventure based on Rick Yancey's novel, starring Chloe Grace Moretz and Liev Schreiber(n)

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin, who exists at the beck and call of a mysterious organisation, fails in his latest mission, and becomes a target himself, as security forces worldwide become aware of his existence and a rival agent is assigned to tie up loose ends. Action thriller, starring Timothy Olyphant, Dougray Scott and Olga Kurylenko(n)

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: The latest in a long line of genetically engineered clones bred to be the perfect assassin takes on a mission that strikes close to home. A corporation intends to use the technology that created him to build an army of superhuman killers. As the assassin fights to bring them down, he uncovers the dark secrets surrounding his origin. Action thriller, starring Rupert Friend, Hannah Ware and Zachary Quinto(n)

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster movie, with John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a gang of daredevil extreme sports athletes, and prove that they are responsible for a string of audacious bank robberies. As he pushes himself to the limit to prove his worth to the group, he forms an intense relationship with their enigmatic leader. Action thriller remake, starring Edgar Ramirez, Luke Bracey and Ray Winstone(n)

programme.title: Invincible
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck barman is having a hard time coping after his wife leaves him and he loses his teaching job. His fortunes turn around when the American football team he has supported all his life holds open trials and, against all odds, he wins a place on the squad. Fact-based sporting drama, starring Mark Wahlberg, Greg Kinnear and Elizabeth Banks

programme.title: Benji the Hunted
programme.desc: Talented mongrel Benji is separated from his trainer in a shipwreck and ends up stranded in the Canadian wilderness - where he becomes foster father to a litter of orphaned cougar cubs. However, a hungry timber wolf is also prowling in the area, and looks set to clash with the courageous dog. Disney adventure, starring Red Steagall, Frank Inn and Nancy Francis

programme.title: Rascal
programme.desc: A boy growing up in Wisconsin is frequently left alone following his mother's death, as his travelling salesman father spends most of the time away from home. The youngster comes across a baby raccoon that has been abandoned by its family, and the animal becomes his constant companion. Fact-based family drama, starring Bill Mumy and Steve Forrest

programme.title: Pocahontas II: Journey to a New World
programme.desc: The Native American princess travels to England on a diplomatic quest to broker peace between the two nations - but faces fierce opposition from the devious Governor Ratcliffe. Disney animated adventure sequel, featuring the voices of Irene Bedard, Jim Cummings, Donal Gibson and Judy Kuhn

programme.title: Lady and the Tramp II: Scamp's Adventure
programme.desc: The son of the canine couple leaves home to join a pack of rough-and-ready strays, but he soon discovers the grass is not always greener on the other side. Animated sequel, with the voices of Scott Wolf, Alyssa Milano, Jodi Benson and Jeff Bennett

programme.title: Monsters, Inc
programme.desc: Two monsters work for an energy firm that employs scary creatures to sneak into children's bedrooms and convert their screams into power. However, when a little girl accidentally wanders into the pair's domain, they have to race against time to return her safely home before anyone finds out. Pixar animated comedy, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Steve Buscemi and James Coburn

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: A rat finds his love of fine food has made him an outcast to his less discerning family. Separated from his fellow rodents by a storm, he winds up in a famous French restaurant, where he helps an incompetent kitchen assistant become the greatest chef in Paris. Pixar animated comedy from the director of The Incredibles, with the voices of Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano and Peter O'Toole

programme.title: Queen Of Katwe
programme.desc: The life of a poor Ugandan youngster is changed forever when she is introduced to the game of chess. Drama, starring David Oyelowo, Lupita Nyong'o and Madina Nalwanga

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: A lion prince blames himself for his father's death and flees into the wilderness, leaving his wicked uncle to take over. As the cub grows to adulthood, he receives a vision of the dead king, who inspires him to seek revenge and reclaim his rightful throne. Disney animated musical, featuring the voices of Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, Rowan Atkinson, Whoopi Goldberg and James Earl Jones

programme.title: Lilo & Stitch
programme.desc: A manic, mischievous alien escapes from the galactic police and crash-lands his spaceship on Hawaii. A lonely little girl mistakes the stranded creature for a dog and adopts him - but alien and Earth authorities are soon combing the island in search of him. Disney animated sci-fi comedy, with the voices of Daveigh Chase, Chris Sanders, Tia Carrere, Ving Rhames and David Ogden Stiers

programme.title: Monsters, Inc
programme.desc: Two monsters work for an energy firm that employs scary creatures to sneak into children's bedrooms and convert their screams into power. However, when a little girl accidentally wanders into the pair's domain, they have to race against time to return her safely home before anyone finds out. Pixar animated comedy, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Steve Buscemi and James Coburn

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: A rat finds his love of fine food has made him an outcast to his less discerning family. Separated from his fellow rodents by a storm, he winds up in a famous French restaurant, where he helps an incompetent kitchen assistant become the greatest chef in Paris. Pixar animated comedy from the director of The Incredibles, with the voices of Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano and Peter O'Toole

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: A lion prince blames himself for his father's death and flees into the wilderness, leaving his wicked uncle to take over. As the cub grows to adulthood, he receives a vision of the dead king, who inspires him to seek revenge and reclaim his rightful throne. Disney animated musical, featuring the voices of Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, Rowan Atkinson, Whoopi Goldberg and James Earl Jones

programme.title: Queen Of Katwe
programme.desc: The life of a poor Ugandan youngster is changed forever when she is introduced to the game of chess. Drama, starring David Oyelowo, Lupita Nyong'o and Madina Nalwanga

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
programme.desc: A buccaneer and a blacksmith commandeer a British ship and set sail in pursuit of a pirate captain who has kidnapped a colonial governor's daughter. However, their quarry and his crew are under a curse that turns them into living skeletons - and makes them impossible to kill. Swashbuckling fantasy adventure, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Geoffrey Rush, Jack Davenport and Jonathan Pryce

programme.title: The Gnome-Mobile
programme.desc: An eccentric millionaire, along with his niece and nephew, finds two gnomes whose homes have been destroyed. They decide to help them find the rest of the tribe, but the family's friends think the tiny creatures are a figment of their imagination. Children's fantasy, starring Walter Brennan, Matthew Garber and Karen Dotrice

programme.title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
programme.desc: A Victorian scientist investigating the mysterious sinking of whaling ships in the Pacific falls overboard during an attack on his vessel. Along with a veteran mariner and a diver, he is picked up and taken captive by Captain Nemo and whisked away on a series of adventures in his futuristic submarine. Disney fantasy, based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Kirk Douglas, James Mason, Paul Lukas and Peter Lorre

programme.title: Lady and the Tramp
programme.desc: A pet cocker spaniel fears her owners will reject her when they become parents, and the arrival of two villainous siamese cats in the house leaves her feeling more unwelcome. Driven from her home, she encounters a roguish stray mongrel, who introduces her to his carefree life on the streets. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Barbara Luddy, Larry Roberts and Peggy Lee

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Moana
programme.desc: To save her island home from a terrible curse, a brave Polynesian teenager must set sail and journey into the great blue yonder. Disney animation, with the voices of Dwayne Johnson, Auli'i Cravalho, Rachel House and Temuera Morrison

programme.title: Inside Out
programme.desc: Inside 11-year-old Riley's head lives a team of five that controls her emotions. Led by the eternally upbeat Joy, they have always ensured she lived a happy life - but when Riley's parents move to a new city, she is plunged into depression and the emotions face a crisis that threatens their entire world. Pixar animated fantasy, with the voices of Amy Poehler and Phyllis Smith

programme.title: Lady and the Tramp
programme.desc: A pet cocker spaniel fears her owners will reject her when they become parents, and the arrival of two villainous siamese cats in the house leaves her feeling more unwelcome. Driven from her home, she encounters a roguish stray mongrel, who introduces her to his carefree life on the streets. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Barbara Luddy, Larry Roberts and Peggy Lee

programme.title: Bambi
programme.desc: A young deer grows up in the forest, forming close friendships with other woodland creatures. When tragedy strikes, he is suddenly forced to fend for himself but ultimately becomes brave and resourceful enough to save his friends during a forest fire. Animated drama, with the voices of Bobby Stewart, Hardie Albright and Donnie Dunagan

programme.title: BURN.E
programme.desc: Short Pixar animated adventure featuring characters from WALL.E and set during the events of the movie. WALL.E's adventures on the starship Axiom accidentally cause no end of trouble for a welding robot trying to fix the vessel's hull. With the voices of Angus MacLane and Tessa Swigart

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson

programme.title: Moana
programme.desc: To save her island home from a terrible curse, a brave Polynesian teenager must set sail and journey into the great blue yonder. Disney animation, with the voices of Dwayne Johnson, Auli'i Cravalho, Rachel House and Temuera Morrison

programme.title: Inside Out

Led by the eternally upbeat Joy, they have always ensured she lived a happy life - but when Riley's parents move to a new city, she is plunged into depression and the emotions face a crisis that threatens their entire world. Pixar animated fantasy, with the voices of Amy Poehler and Phyllis Smith

programme.title: The Love Bug
programme.desc: Herbie, an irrepressible Beetle car with a mind of its own, takes a shine to a struggling racing driver and leads him to victory on the track. However, his success attracts the attention of an unscrupulous rival competitor, who will go to any lengths to win the most important race of all. Disney comedy, starring Dean Jones, Michele Lee, Buddy Hackett and David Tomlinson

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
programme.desc: Wily rogue Captain Jack Sparrow finds an old debt coming back to haunt him. Years before, he sold his soul to the legendary Davy Jones, who has now risen from the depths of the ocean to collect what he is owed - with a giant sea monster at his command. Meanwhile, ruthless trader Lord Beckett is intent on seizing control of the Caribbean, and sets out to turn Jack and his allies against one another. Swashbuckling adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley, Jack Davenport and Bill Nighy

programme.title: In Search of the Castaways
programme.desc: The two children of a missing sea captain receive a message in a bottle that convinces them their father is still alive. Enlisting an eccentric French professor to help them find him, they embark on round-the-world journey and face natural disasters and mutineers during the voyage. Children's adventure based on a novel by Jules Verne, starring Maurice Chevalier, Hayley Mills and George Sanders(n)

programme.title: Bambi II
programme.desc: The young fawn is reunited with his father, a wise stag, in the aftermath of his mother's death. The older animal reluctantly takes on his parental responsibilities, teaching his son the ways of the forest and helping him find the courage to face the challenges ahead. Disney animated prequel, with the voices of Patrick Stewart and Alexander Gould(n)

programme.title: Now You See Him, Now You Don't
programme.desc: A science student creates an invisibility spray, an invention that could help save his college from financial ruin - but it soon attracts the attention of a gang of scheming crooks wanting to use it for more dishonest ends. Disney adventure, sequel to The Computer Wore Tennis Shoes, starring Kurt Russell, Cesar Romero, Joe Flynn and Jim Backus(n)

programme.title: Monsters, Inc
programme.desc: Two monsters work for an energy firm that employs scary creatures to sneak into children's bedrooms and convert their screams into power. However, when a little girl accidentally wanders into the pair's domain, they have to race against time to return her safely home before anyone finds out. Pixar animated comedy, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Steve Buscemi and James Coburn(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson(n)

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement(n)

programme.title: Brave
programme.desc: A princess defies her mother's plans to secure peace by marrying her off to the son of one of their allies. A witch provides the rebellious royal with a magic spell to change her fate, but the enchantment backfires disastrously when the queen is transformed into a bear. Pixar's animated fantasy, with the voices of Kelly Macdonald, Emma Thompson and Billy Connolly(n)

programme.title: Bambi
programme.desc: A young deer grows up in the forest, forming close friendships with other woodland creatures. When tragedy strikes, he is suddenly forced to fend for himself but ultimately becomes brave and resourceful enough to save his friends during a forest fire. Animated drama, with the voices of Bobby Stewart, Hardie Albright and Donnie Dunagan(n)

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp(n)

programme.title: Tinker Bell and the Secret of the Wings
programme.desc: The fairy becomes curious about the mysterious winter forest where fairies never dare to go. She travels into the cold woods, where she meets a new friend and uncovers a threat to both their homes that they must work together to prevent. Disney animated adventure, with the voices of Mae Whitman, Lucy Hale, Anjelica Huston and Timothy Dalton(n)

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson(n)

programme.title: Brave

A witch provides the rebellious royal with a magic spell to change her fate, but the enchantment backfires disastrously when the queen is transformed into a bear. Pixar's animated fantasy, with the voices of Kelly Macdonald, Emma Thompson and Billy Connolly(n)

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp(n)

programme.title: Eight Below
programme.desc: An Antarctic scientific expedition has to be aborted when a blizzard hits, forcing their guide to leave behind his team of huskies in the frozen wilderness. He is determined to return and rescue the animals, but in the meantime, the dogs have to rely on pack instinct alone to ensure their survival in the hostile climate. Disney adventure, starring Paul Walker, Bruce Greenwood and Jason Biggs(n)

programme.title: Man of the House
programme.desc: A youngster is doing his best to make life hell for his potential stepfather and sabotaging all his plans to marry his mother, when a series of unforeseen events brings the pair closer together. Disney comedy, starring Chevy Chase, Farrah Fawcett, Jonathan Taylor Thomas and George Wendt

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: The hapless hound and his chums reunite after a bitter break-up to solve a baffling mystery in the ghost-themed tourist resort of Spooky Island, whose owner is convinced he has a genuine haunting on his hands. Live-action comedy adventure based on the cartoon series, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr, Linda Cardellini and Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: Homer unwittingly pollutes Lake Springfield, so the US government decides to isolate the city underneath a giant dome. The Simpsons manage to escape and plan to start a new life in Alaska - but learn Springfield is about to be destroyed, and return to save their friends. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright and Yeardley Smith

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and company try to take Broadway by storm with their college show, setting the stage for a host of misadventures as they yearn for stardom in the Big Apple and set out to raise the money to finance their production. Comedy, performed by Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with appearances by Liza Minnelli, Art Carney, Dabney Coleman, Gregory Hines, Joan Rivers, Brooke Shields, Linda Lavin and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: Gonzo hits the road with pal Rizzo in tow and goes in search of his roots - only to make the amazing discovery that his parents belonged to a race of aliens. He then has to choose whether to board a UFO and return to his family, or stay with the friends he knows and loves. Family comedy, with F Murray Abraham, David Arquette, Ray Liotta, Andie MacDowell and Rob Schneider alongside the puppets

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: The pig and his farmyard pals take a trip to the big city, where their curiosity and love of adventure lands them in trouble, leaving the courageous Babe to find a way to save his chums from danger. Family comedy sequel, starring Magda Szubanski, Mickey Rooney and James Cromwell, and featuring the voice of Elizabeth Daily as Babe

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is reunited with his long-lost father, whose help he will need when a supernatural foe threatens all of China. Father and son travel to a secret village populated by other pandas, and must train them in martial arts so they can defend their home. Animated comedy sequel, with the voices of Jack Black, Bryan Cranston, Angelina Jolie and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielberg's fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: An intrepid treasure-hunter follows a series of ingenious clues in a perilous quest to track down a war chest hidden by America's founding fathers generations before. He has to contend with determined rivals in the shape of a treacherous associate and the FBI. Action adventure, starring Nicolas Cage, Diane Kruger, Sean Bean and Justin Bartha

programme.title: A Warrior's Tail
programme.desc: A boy escapes when his village comes under attack by a pack of hyenas, and goes to get help. He meets a magical white wolf, who leads him on a journey in search of a magician who can help them find a powerful warrior - but many danger's lie between them and the sorcerer's mountain home. Animated fantasy, with the voices of Milla Jovovich, Whoopi Goldberg and Sharon Stone

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 3

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell

programme.title: Race to Witch Mountain
programme.desc: An ex-convict cab driver becomes the protector of two aliens disguised as children who claim to hold the key to Earth's continued existence. As he races against time to return the visitors to their spaceship, he must also hold off hostile government agents and a sinister extraterrestrial assassin. Sci-fi adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, AnnaSophia Robb, Alexander Ludwig and Carla Gugino

programme.title: Rabbit School: Guardians Of The Golden Egg
programme.desc: When the Easter rabbit school comes under threat from a family of foxes plotting to steal the legendary golden egg, it's up to young Max to save the day. Animated adventure, featuring the voice of Noah Levi and Senta Berger

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: An orphan wins the fatherly affections of a tough-talking billionaire - but the no-good owner of the orphanage and her brother are out to ruin the girl's chances of happiness and make a quick profit in the process. Musical, directed by John Huston, based on the stage play. Starring Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett and Tim Curry

programme.title: Strange Magic
programme.desc: A fairy living in an enchanted forest tries to rescue her sister from a monstrous creature. Meanwhile, the magical kingdom is thrown into chaos by a love potion, that results in a series of unexpected romances. Animated fantasy musical, with the voices of Evan Rachel Wood, Alan Cumming and Kristin Chenoweth

programme.title: Space Jam
programme.desc: Aliens arrive on Earth to abduct the Looney Tunes gang as a new attraction at their failing intergalactic theme park. To keep their freedom, Bugs Bunny and friends challenge the invaders to a high-stakes basketball game, calling on Michael Jordan to save the day and send the extraterrestrials back where they came from. Live action and animated comedy, starring Bill Murray and Danny DeVito, with the voices of Billy West and Bill Farmer

programme.title: Rabbit School: Guardians Of The Golden Egg

Sci-fi adventure, starring Dwayne Johnson, AnnaSophia Robb, Alexander Ludwig and Carla Gugino

programme.title: The Cat from Outer Space
programme.desc: A UFO crash-lands on Earth and its only occupant is an alien cat whose collar gives him strange powers, including the ability to communicate telepathically with humans. This turns out to be a useful skill when he is forced to enlist help to get his spaceship back after the US government seizes it. Disney sci-fi comedy, with Roddy McDowall and Sandy Duncan

programme.title: First Kid
programme.desc: The mischievous son of the US president drives his personal bodyguard to a breakdown with his wild ways. Luckily, the secret service man's muscular replacement is made of sterner stuff - and his refusal to give in to the lad's trickery soon leads to a grudging respect between the two. Disney comedy, starring Sinbad, Brock Pierce, Robert Guillaume, Timothy Busfield and Zachary Ty Bryan(n)

programme.title: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
programme.desc: The amateur detectives attend the grand opening of a museum in their honour, featuring the costumes from all the fake monsters they exposed. The exhibits are stolen by a masked villain, who sets about re-creating all the gang's worst enemies. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr and Linda Cardellini(n)

programme.title: The Ant Bully
programme.desc: A friendless, moody 10-year-old spends his free time terrorising ants - until the tiny creatures take their revenge by magically reducing him to their own size and forcing him to learn how to contribute to colony life. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Nicolas Cage, Meryl Streep and Paul Giamatti(n)

programme.title: Horton Hears a Who
programme.desc: A kindly elephant hears a cry of help coming from a speck of dust and discovers the minuscule city of Whoville. As he tries to help its citizens, the other animals begin to question his sanity, and the evil Kangaroo incites them to turn against the do-gooder. Animated adaptation of Dr Seuss's book, with the voices of Jim Carrey, Steve Carell, Carol Burnett, Seth Rogen and Will Arnett(n)

programme.title: Top Cat Begins
programme.desc: The cunning alley cat assembles a gang of feline friends to steal diamonds from a gangster. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jason Harris and Chris Edgerly(n)

programme.title: Animal Kingdom: Let's Go Ape
programme.desc: A primate king's outcast son eventually comes into his own, learning how to run on two legs and the secrets of fire. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Ben Bishop, Anjella Mackintosh and Geoff Searle(n)

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Three mismatched prehistoric animals join forces to return a human infant to its tribe - but as their journey unfolds, the creatures fail to anticipate the many perils and pitfalls that lay in store for them. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of John Leguizamo, Ray Romano, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic and Jack Black(n)

programme.title: Storks
programme.desc: Animated adventure about a world where storks now deliver everything but babies, until an office mishap that is. With the voices of Andy Samberg, Kelsey Grammer and Katie Crown(n)

programme.title: Horton Hears a Who

programme.title: Storks
